So I did this ad so I said
the Nauga is ugly but the

1385.82.text:
And I show it to them and

unusual, and they came

said they can't run it
because they thought that

1399.27.text:

1434.70.text:

take 20 years when you can

1498.86.text:

1523.69.text:
